# Key Highlights

-   **Expert Panels & Plenary Talks**\
    Engage with global experts on agrobiodiversity and sustainable agriculture.

-   **Seed Fair**\
    Showcasing unique seeds and biodiversity from local farmers.

-   **Paper Presentations & Case Studies**\
    Present research findings, innovations, and success stories.

-   **Interactive Workshops & Exhibitions**\
    Hands-on sessions and partner exhibitions.

-   **Networking Events**\
    Opportunities to collaborate with stakeholders from diverse sectors.

-   **Field Visit to Model Agrobiodiversity Farms**\
    Experience on-ground innovations and farmer-led solutions.
